item.title: Trump 'losing' trade war with China going in to Xi meeting, Senate Democrats say in report
item.description: "Trump needs to change course on his trade war with China now and stop hurting American families, farmers, and businesses," Sen. Elizabeth Warren said...

item.title: Trump-Xi meeting nears with high stakes and hopes, but few details
item.description: The bilat with President Donald Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping comes just as a recent flare-up in U.S.-China trade relations has appeared to c...

item.title: Government shutdown could cost U.S. economy up to $14 billion, CBO says
item.description: U.S. senators are pessimistic that they will reach a deal to reopen the federal government.

item.title: Trump announces trade breakthrough with South Korea on Asia trip
item.description: Donald Trump and South Korean President Lee Jae Myung finalized details of their fraught trade deal at a summit in South Korea on Wednesday.

item.title: Israel strikes Gaza after accusing Hamas of violating U.S.-brokered ceasefire
